data.eml:eml: Integrated taxonomy of a new species of black fly in the subgenus Trichodagmia (Diptera: Simuliidae) from the Páramo Region of Colombia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Diaz, Sofia A., Moncada, Ligia I., Murcia, Carlos H., Lotta, Ingrid A., Matta, Nubia E., Adler, Peter H. (2015): Integrated taxonomy of a new species of black fly in the subgenus Trichodagmia (Diptera: Simuliidae) from the Páramo Region of Colombia. Zootaxa 3914 (5): 541-557, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3914.5.3
